channel.title: [508] Need one tag!

item.title: [508] Need one tag!
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

How to add if thieving skill is 99?

case 22: //Thieving master
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2270, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Martin”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “Gratz with your Thieving skillcape!”, 241, 4);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9779, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9777, 1);
}else{
p.frames.showChatboxInterface(p, 241);
p.frames.animateInterfaceId(p, 9850, 241, 2);
p.frames.setNPCId(p, 2270, 241, 2);
p.frames.setString(p, “Martin”, 241, 3);
p.frames.setString(p, “You need 99 Thieving to get a skill cape!”, 241, 4);
break;

Read full topic
